agentUtterance.text: Hi there! I'm from IssueCopilot.AI. Which type of issue can I help you with today: Warranty+Returns or Technical Issues or Billing+Payments or Product Enquiry?

userUtterance.text: I have a query regarding my recent payment for a product

playbookInput.precedingConversationSummary: User has queries related to Billing and Payment issues.

playbookOutput.executionSummary: User is satisfied with the resolution

agentUtterance.text: Is there anything else you need help with?

userUtterance.text: Yeah I wanted to know more about the Poco x4

agentUtterance.text: Is there anything you need my assistance with?

userUtterance.text: No that would be it for today. Thanks!

agentUtterance.text: Ok then goodbye! If you have any issues again, you know where to find me ;)

playbookOutput.executionSummary: Thank you for reaching out to IssueCopilot.AI. We are glad we could help you today. Have a great day!
